game.description: Retrieve the stolen artifact from the treacherous dungeon.
game.objective: Recover the stolen artifact and return it to the quest giver.

tasks.description: Find the entrance to the dungeon.
tasks.objective: Locate the hidden entrance to the treacherous dungeon.
Overcome the powerful guardian to access the stolen artifact.
Find the chamber holding the stolen artifact and acquire it.
Make a harrowing escape from the crumbling dungeon.

game.title: The Stolen Artifact
